name: Just Dance 2017
overview: Just Dance 2017 is more fun & easier to play than ever. Pull out your phone & get it started with hot tracks like "Sorry" by Justin Bieber, "Don't Wanna Know" by Maroon 5, "Lean On" by Major Lazer & DJ Snake ft. MØ, "Cheap Thrills" by Sia ft. Sean Paul, "Cake by the Ocean" by DNCE, "Into You" by Ariana Grande and many more! Get ready for amazing visuals and awesome dance moves that will ignite your house, pulling friends and families off the couch and into a music experience like no other.
